note: I am an occupational therapist and work in a Community Mental Health Team in Cornwall. I live with Martyn and our spaniel cross Reggie. I have lived in Cheshire, Derbyshire, Suffolk, Merseyside, North Yorkshire, and currently the Tamar Valley. In my spare time, I enjoy reading, watching films and TV, walking, nature, the countryside, jigsaws, colouring, and embroidery. My main hobby is taking photos of Devon, Cornwall, and sometimes further a field. I'm also practising my street photography.

note: The lunatics, having taken over the asylum….have now escaped. !
An ex-X premium subscriber, now £11 richer. I like books, sylvanian families, nature photography, travels and food.

I apologize ahead of time for getting any pronouns wrong. If I do, I promise it's not on purpose, I'm just old and slow.

I know I'm supposed to be civil, but I make no promises if I interact with any fascists, white supremacists, or other far-right savages. Expect me to say a lot about politics.

I'm anticapitalist, but not crazy about Marx's solution.

I'm Japanese, Norwegian, and Swedish. I like cooking and nerd stuff.
